features: 【Safe & Strong Magnetic Blocks】Hiwawind magnetic toddler toys made of non-toxic ABS material with ultra smooth surface. Upgrade magnet blocks that can easily click together, then stay firmly for any shape. Super magnet toys that can be easily attached to any magnetic object. Great toys for 3 year old boys and girls to inspire their creativity while having fun.

【STEM Preschool Learning Montessori TOYS】Cultivate future scientists and engineers while having fun! Our magnetic building blocks offer more than just entertainment. It ignites children's interest in STEM disciplines while playing, nurtures problem-solving, critical thinking and spatial thinking, and mathematics skills ...Cool preschool kindergarten classroom must haves & classroom supplies highly recommended by educational expert that provides infinite play and learning possibilities.

【Open-Ended Creative Building Toys】Unleash your child's creativity and engineering skills with Girigi building blocks. As they explore structures of different levels of difficulty, they'll experience pure joy at every step of their building journey and turning their imagination into reality. Great blocks for toddlers to foster their problem-solving abilities, spatial awareness and color coordination skills.

【Engaging & Interactive sensory toys】Ignite infinite sensory play with our premium magnetic building blocks - feel the satisfying touch of its shapes and finely polished surface, heighten the visual stimulation by the vivid colors, comforted by the soothing ASMR-like sounds when the blocks click together...All makes it perfect autism sensory toys for toddlers 1-3 3-4 5-7 and autistic children.

【Cool Kids Toddler toys & Gift For All ages】Cool 3 4 5 year old girl boy birthday gift and toys for 3 4 5 6 7 8 year old boys girls. Suitable for any festivals and occasions, like birthdays, Christmas, Easter, Preschool, Day Care Centers, etc. Kids will enjoy the fun of these magnetic tiles and learn by playing. Highly recommend for parent-to-kid bonding play on holidays and weekend.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Magnetic Cubes 30PCS Magnetic Cubes 65PCS Creative Toys for Kids Magic Water Marbling Creative Toys ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I will give five stars for the blocks themselves. My son loves playing with these magnetic blocks, and this particular set includes a color that is not usually in the primary colors set, of orange. Between these...and the four other boxes I bought of different colors here on Amazon from other companies-I believe we actually have enough to play with and build structures with now. The main picture on here is really misleading, because you would likely need $200 worth of blocks to build that. Don't do that sellers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My toddler loves these so much!
reviews.reviewText: Magnetic blocks have been my toddlers favorite, especially in various sizes! These are on the smaller side which is great for travel, etc. and the magnets are sturdy in them! We love playing with them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Fun! Vert Kid Friendly
reviews.reviewText: Very fun toy! we also have the magnetic tiles, but these work a little better for younger kids. They are much easier to build with and don't pinch little kids fingers like the tiles sometimes do. ( I have a 1 year old for context)The colors are bright and fun. The materials and everything feel like they are high quality. The magnets are also nice and strong, but easy enough for kids to take apart. A lot of fun, definitely recommend for kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just buy 3 sets and be done with it
reviews.reviewText: Have a creative kid? Do they have big plans? They won't have enough blocks then I predict. Buy multiple sets or don't buy at all. It's not worth it.Year later still loves them, still says there aren't enough blocks to build the vision. Teenage years are going to rock my world

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: These blocks are great and I enjoyed them as much as my grandson. They were a little smaller than expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Photo appeared nice , but this set had very small pieces & looked hard for little ones , unhappy - will return

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I feel like I got scammed!
reviews.reviewText: Be careful! All the photoshopped photos of this product are misleading. The blocks are a lot smaller than what’s shown in the photos. Thought I was getting a steal of a deal but now feel like these blocks aren’t worth the price that I paid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The colors are bright and colorful and are fun to play with.
reviews.reviewText: EDIT** Again I just want to say how amazing these blocks are. We visited my grandson who is almost 3, and he took these blocks with him everywhere. The little bag that was included helped him carry them. Being as they are magnetic they are easy to keep together and for him to build without blocks falling everywhere- especially in a restaurant, where keeping a toddler entertained is sometimes impossible. But we would take these blocks and he was always happy and there was never a huge mess. They are also lightweight, so they are quiet. I’m buying another set so he can add onto his block building!!Original Post: We bought this for our grandson who is obsessed with blocks. These are a great size to hold and play with for a toddler. They seem to be very sturdy and the magnets connect well. The colors are bright and colorful and he loves to play with them. He can just sit there and play for hours. Definitely recommended!!!
